## News

Scrapes news articles.

```{r}
library(httr2)
dir.create("data", showWarnings = FALSE)


date <- Sys.Date() - 1
req <- request("https://newsapi.org/v2/everything") |>
    req_url_query(
        q = '"data science"',
        from = date,
        pageSize = 10,
        apiKey = Sys.getenv("NEWS_API_KEY")
    )

req_perform(req, path = paste0("data/", date, ".json"))

```
